articles.title: Mike Vrabel had a blunt response to report about Titans owner’s alleged grudge
articles.description:
Vrabel also discussed the challenge of a quick turnaround ahead of a Thursday night game, and the comparisons his team (and his quarterback) face with past Patriot greatness.

The post Mike Vrabel had a blunt response to report about Titans owner’s alleged grudge appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Vrabel addressed Titans owner's alleged grudge during a press conference.
Vrabel emphasized the challenge of a quick turnaround for the Thursday night game.
Boston residents may feel the impact of comparisons to past Patriots' success.

articles.title: Trump pardons Rudy Giuliani and others who backed efforts to overturn 2020 election, official says
articles.description:
Presidential pardons apply only to federal crimes, and none of the Trump allies named were charged in federal cases over the 2020 election.

The post Trump pardons Rudy Giuliani and others who backed efforts to overturn 2020 election, official says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Trump pardoned Rudy Giuliani and others involved in 2020 election overturn efforts.
Pardons apply only to federal crimes; none faced federal charges.
Local implications include potential shifts in political support among Boston voters.
